text: The Fuller Theological Seminary is in Pasadena, California. It is one of North America's largest seminaries. The Seminary has over 4,300 students from over 67 countries and 108 denominations. == References == == Other websites == *Official site Category:Colleges and universities in California Category:Christian colleges and universities in the United States Category:Pasadena, California Category:Seminaries Category:1947 establishments in the United States Category:1940s establishments in California
title: Fuller Theological Seminary
